**About:**
# I am a Manager Human Resources at InnovAccer, an awesome Analytics Startup based out at Noida, I love to learn new technologies and implement it in automating people management. I am expert in Recruiting and People Management. Feel free to get in touch for any kind of queries and concerns.
# 

**You can connect me on** [LinkedIn](https://in.linkedin.com/in/vivekshrivastavahr) for regular updates on openings at Innovaccer.

**Current Openings @ Innovaccer Inc** 
InnovAccer Inc invites application for the below mentioned positions.

1. Sales Head ( Government Business) -3 to 7 yrs exp, B.Tech+MBA, Exposure to NCR Market and Strong Networking in Govt Sector.
2. IOS Developer- 2-4 yrs B.Tech (CS/IT) exposure to cloud computing and python/java is preferred.
3. UX Designer- 2- 5Yrs (Design/ CS/ IT) Design with coding in HTML, CSS is preferred. However coding is not mandatory. Please share portfolio also with your CV
4. UI Developer- 1-4 Yrs, B.Tech(CS/IT) AngularJS, HTML5, CSS, Javascript, please share portfolio also with your CV.
5. Python Developer- 1-4 Yrs, B.Tech (CS/IT) Strong Tech/Coding with Cloud, Linux, Python, Java, Google API and excellent Comm skills.
6. Senior Application Developer- 2-5 yrs, B.Tech (CS/IT) Strong Tech/Coding with Cloud, Linux, Python, Google API and excellent Comm skills.
7. Android Developer- 1-4 Yrs, B.Tech (CS/IT) Strong Tech and excellent Comm skills.
8. Data Scientist- 0-2 yrs (Mathematics & Computing / CS) from IIT's/BITS Pilani Background with R/SAS and strong statistical skills. excellent Comm skills.
9. Decision Scientist- 0-2 yrs B.Tech(CS/IT) from IIT's/BITS/IIIT's/NIT's) Background with ML, NLP, and strong Algorithmic skills with excellent Comm skills.
10. Data Quality Manager- 2-4 yrs, B.Tech (CS/IT) with Strong Tech Background with Excellent Comm Skills.
11. Sales Ambassador- 1 to 3 yrs (B.Tech with excellent comm skills and tech background) is preferred.

**Location - Delhi NCR, Salary - NO BAR for right candidate !**

**Apply - Send your CV with CTC and Notice Period details on vivek.shrivastava@innovaccer.com after sending your CV you may call me on 09873246043.**

Please keep visiting, I'll be updating more openings here... Good Luck for your Job Search :)

Regards,

Vivek Shrivastava

Manager, Human Resources
